projects.title: Trivia Game
projects.subtitle: Java Group Project
projects.body: Trivia is a quiz game which consists of spinning roulette and answer the question related to some topics by Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot and Thymeleaf

projects.title: Famus Sport Tour
projects.subtitle: Swift Group Project
projects.body: An application that gives tourists suggestions on where to go in Vancouver by Swift, MapKit and Firebase
